metadata.title: inflee.app - Monetize Your Knowledge with AI
metadata.description: AI platform for digital creators. Create e-books, build landing pages, and earn without a registered business.
metadata.keywords: ai, e-book, generator, monetization, creators, influencers, landing page
metadata.ogTitle: inflee.app - Start Earning from Your Knowledge
metadata.ogDescription: Create a professional e-book and landing page in 5 minutes. No coding, no graphic designer, no business registration required.

hero.subtitle: Harness the power of AI more effectively than ever before!
hero.benefit1: No thousands of followers needed - just a few hundred to start
hero.benefit2: No business registration or social security required - fully legal
hero.benefit3: No technical knowledge or special tools needed - forget about Canva!
hero.subCta: 21-day free trial available. No credit card required to create.

title.part3: for new audiences and engage current ones

howItWorks.subtitle: Stop procrastinating. Create an e-book and a download page for it ‚Äì receive your first payments from your community today.

step1.title: 1. Create a professional e-book
step1.text: Provide a title, paste a link to an article, or upload a PDF. Click "Generate" and in a few moments, you'll have a ready e-book. The AI creates the cover, table of contents, formats chapters, and adds illustrations. You can edit everything in a clean editor or leave it as is ‚Äì your choice.
details: Provide a title and sources (link/PDF)
AI will generate the structure and content of the chapters
Customize the content, you have control over every word
AI will generate a cover and illustrations. You can also add your own graphics
Your e-book is ready for publication in minutes

step2.title: 2. Generate a landing page
step2.text: Based on your e-book's content, the AI will create a complete webpage with engaging copy, a sign-up form, and CTA buttons. You can customize colors, text, and layout in just a few clicks. Publish with one click ‚Äì a ready-to-share page for your social media.
details: AI will write the entire copy for the landing page
You can freely customize the page's content and color scheme
Responsive design (beautiful and effective on every device)
When everything is ready, publish with a single click
The page is now accessible to everyone via a link or QR code
Share, collect contacts, and accept payments

step3.title: 3. Collect and manage leads
step3.text: Anyone who downloads your e-book is automatically added to your database. You can see all contacts, manage statuses, and add notes. You can export the database to XLS, PDF, or CSV and use it in email or SMS campaigns.
details: All your contacts available in a user-friendly format
Statuses and notes for each entry in the database
Easy export to Excel, PDF, or CSV files
Real-time statistics of your page visits and downloads
Integration with popular email and SMS marketing tools coming soon

step4.title: 4. Monetize and automate
step4.text: Easily integrate your buycoffee.to or Patronite account ‚Äì grateful followers will gladly buy you a coffee, and you can enjoy your first monetization. Connect ManyChat and automatically send e-books to people who comment on your Instagram or Facebook posts. Your first 1000 contacts in ManyChat are free.
details: Simple integration with buycoffee.to or Patronite
First payments from fans possible today
Thanks to our partnership, you can start using ManyChat for FREE
Guaranteed paid collaboration offers from Inflee.app partners for top accounts
No commission for inflee.app from payments or our partners' fees

features.subtitle: Inflee.app is more than an AI generator. It's a complete platform designed to effectively build and monetize your community.

feature1.title: E-book ready in 5 minutes
feature1.text: Paste a link or upload your text. The AI does the heavy lifting, creating the structure and content, while you have full control over the final result and can edit every element.

benefits.text: Save dozens of hours of writing
End writer's block and the blank page
Full control over the content at every stage
Export to PDF with a single click

feature2.title: Design that impresses
feature2.text: The AI will generate an eye-catching cover and consistent graphics for you. Your materials will look professional without hiring a graphic designer.

benefits.text: Build an expert image from the first glance
Save money on graphic design services
Increase the appeal of your downloadable materials
No licensing fees for graphics

feature3.title: Landing page without coding
feature3.text: The AI will automatically write the copy for your landing page. You can freely edit it, adjust the colors, and publish with a single click.

benefits.text: Launch a campaign in minutes, not weeks
No fees for a domain and hosting
Full control over the final look and content
High effectiveness thanks to a proven structure

feature4.title: Build your community
feature4.text: Every e-book download is a new contact in your database. Collect emails and build an independent community, free from the whims of social media algorithms.

benefits.text: Your most important marketing asset
Direct communication with your fans
The perfect foundation for selling future products
Export to formats compatible with email/SMS tools

feature5.title: Earn from day one
feature5.text: Integrate your buycoffee.to profile with a single click and start generating legal income without needing to register a business.

benefits.text: Generate legal income without a company
Strengthen relationships with your community
A ready-to-use solution, no complicated setup
No commission taken by Inflee

feature6.title: Grow your business
feature6.text: Your list is growing? Great! Easily connect it with mailing systems or automate your communication with our ManyChat integration.

benefits.text: Full control over your data
Scale your marketing efforts without limits
Use collected contacts to sell products
Guarantee of a paid collaboration offer

faq1.a: Inflee is for anyone who wants to turn their knowledge into a digital product: creators, experts, coaches, freelancers, marketers, and small businesses. If you have knowledge to share and want to build a community, Inflee is for you. No technical skills or business registration required.

faq2.q: What kind of content can I use to create an e-book?
faq2.a: You can paste a link to an article, a LinkedIn post, share a Google/Notion document, or upload a PDF/DOCX/TXT file. Inflee also accepts plain text copied directly. We support most popular content formats.

faq3.q: Can I edit the generated content?
faq3.a: Yes. Both the e-book content and the landing page copy are fully editable. The AI does 90% of the work, you provide the final touch. You have full control over every element ‚Äì from titles to illustrations.

faq4.q: Do I need to provide card details to start?
faq4.a: No. The 21-day free trial does not require a credit card. Just sign up and start creating. No strings attached.

faq5.q: Do I need a registered business?
faq5.a: No. You can start earning from your knowledge without registering a business. If you use buycoffee.to, they handle the formal aspects. Inflee does not require any company documents.

faq6.q: How much does it cost to generate graphics with AI?
faq6.a: All costs for generating AI graphics are included in your plan's price. You pay nothing extra for covers or illustrations. The free plan has a generation limit, while paid plans are unlimited.

finalCta.subtitle: Join thousands of creators who are already building their mailing lists and earning from their knowledge. Your journey starts here.
